Controllers.Input Methods: Capacitive face buttons, capacitive joystick, capacitive touch pad, capacitive index trigger, middle finger trigger, removable stylus attachment
Controllers.Finger Tracking: Partial finger and thumb tracking via capacitive sensors

System.CPU: Octa-core Kryo 585 (1 x 2.84 GHz, 3 x 2.42 GHz, 4 x 1.8 GHz)

faq.question: When was Meta Quest Pro released?
faq.answer: Meta Quest Pro was released on October 25th, 2022, following an announcement on October 28th, 2021.

faq.question: How much does Meta Quest Pro cost?
faq.answer: Meta Quest Pro, complete with controllers can be purchased for $999.

faq.question: What is the resolution of Meta Quest Pro?
faq.answer: Meta Quest Pro has a resolution of 1800x1920 per-eye, totalling approximately 3.46 million pixels per-eye, or 6.91 million pixels overall.

faq.question: What is the FoV of Meta Quest Pro?
faq.answer: Meta Quest Pro has an estimated horizontal field of view of 106 degrees. Additionally, the headset has an estimated diagonal field of view of 95.57 degrees. The vertical FoV of Meta Quest Pro is not yet known.

faq.question: Does Meta Quest Pro have hand tracking?
faq.answer: Meta Quest Pro supports hand tracking.

faq.question: Does Meta Quest Pro have eye tracking?
faq.answer: Meta Quest Pro supports eye and face tracking.
